page.title: 13JACOBS LADDER
page.content: Around 1904 there was a man called {Ronald Pavey.}He invented his own religion.He believed that all men were angels with parts of wings in their backs.He also believed that to go to heaven you had to grow your wings.He had heard the story of Jacob going to heaven up a long{ladder}so he built his own out of concrete steps up part of the cliffs.But he thought it was not high enough so he built a tower.He then built a pair of wings and printed a picture of them on a postcard.He then tried to fly by jumping off the tower but he fell into the trees because he survived he was sure all men were angels.
